methods.name: create
methods.desc: create an instance of the assetmanager contract which handles collections of an ASA or a single ASA

args.name: collectionDetails
args.desc: [collectibleType( collection | default: single ), isContentMutable ] ! -> mutable content utilizes reserve address for mutable URL!

methods.name: swapin
methods.desc: Insert an existing ASA and add it to the collection

args.name: asset_id
args.desc: The ID of the ASA to swap into the contract

methods.name: changeEnforcer
methods.desc: Insert an existing ASA and add it to the collection

args.name: new Admin address for the asset
